headline: eBay (EBAY) Valuation: Is the Recent Rally Justified?
summary: eBay (EBAY) shares have been on investors’ radar lately, up nearly 18% in the past three months. The company’s performance stands out as market participants weigh its recent results and future prospects in today's retail landscape. See our latest analysis for eBay. Momentum around eBay has picked up, with its share price jumping nearly 48% year-to-date and catching attention thanks to solid quarterly results and greater optimism for the retail sector. Long-term shareholders are also enjoying...
